meta.content: Alex Palcuie Blog
Alexandru Palcuie, elev la Colegiul National Mircea cel Batran, Rm. Valcea, pasionat de informatica, baschet si voluntariat.
Alexandru Palcuie
meta.name: author

meta.content: DefCamp 2011, the first cyber-security conference in Romania, was held in Bran between 30 September - 2 October. Almost 70 hackers gathered to talk, share experience and have fun.
meta.name: description

meta.content: defcamp, 2011, bran, security, conference
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: GrepIT Botosani 2011, was the final contest of the summer, and took place between 28 August and 2 September. There were 2 categories: developers (split in apps and web) and media (split into stop motion and movies). It was the a funny experience, where I felt like the organizers were also contestants. It was also a lesson for me, on how to organize an event.
meta.name: description

meta.content: grepit, 2011, botosani, concurs
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: Dear Steve, This morning, when I woke up... I sensed it was something wrong. And as a matter of coincidence, when I went to school, I took my blue t-shirt with an iPod.
meta.name: description

meta.content: steve jobs
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: The National Romanian Scout Jamboree took place between 11 and 21 August, in Salistea, Sibiu. Altmost 1.300 scouts participated, and I was one of the lucky persons to spend 10 memorable days, with my patrol from our local center in Valcea.
meta.name: description

meta.content: scout, rojam, jamboree, 2011
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: InfoEducatie is a national IT contest, which takes place every year at Galaciuc, Vrancea. It is a place where high-school hackers gather, to present their projects to juries from different universities or companies (Google, Amazon)
meta.name: description

meta.content: computer, computer science, concurs, contest, infoeducatie, IT
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: What a holiday and how many things to tell about. First I went to Munich with Europe Direct Valcea, then I participated at InfoEducatie contest in Galaciuc, then I went
meta.name: description

meta.content: europe direct, holiday, munchen, munich, travel, vacanta, voluntariat, volunteering
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: Acum un an ?i o saptamâna, îmi stabileam obiectivele pentru anul ?colar ce a trecut. Uitându-ma din nou peste aceasta lista îmi dau seama ca ?tiu doar jumatate din ce ma a?teapta în urmatoarele 9 luni... probabil de aceea e frumoasa via?a.

meta.content: Sunt un fan al handbalului… cred ca merg la meciurile echipei Oltchim Râmnicu-Vâlcea de aproximativ 5 ani. ?i de asemenea, am facut ?i eu pu?in fotbal ?i baschet pâna acum. A?a ca voi vorbi despre evolu?ia echipei, cât timp Anja Andersen a fost antrenoare.
meta.name: description

meta.content: Revin cu al doilea articol, în care va voi prezenta cum sa va transforma?i mobilul (care trebuie doar sa aiba Bluetooth) în propria voastra secretara care va spune mereu ce mai ave?i de facut.

meta.content: În aceasta serie de articole voi încerca sa prezint metoda mea de organizare a timpului, cea mai importanta resursa a noastra, folosind Microsoft Outlook, pe care o folosesc de aproape 4 ani ?i care m-a ajutat sa îmi pun via?a în ordine.
meta.name: description

meta.content: ?i uite ca în sfâr?it avem un update de la Facebook, la cele mai vizitate pagini, cele de profil. Mi se par mult orientate spre cunoa?terea de prieteni noi pentru ca se „descopera” mult mai multe informa?ii personale. meta.content: In aceasta pagina de jurnal voi incerca sa va prezint cum s-au desfasurat ultimele 2-3 saptamani, in care am reusit sa organizez proiectul Let s do it Romania, in judetul meu Valcea.

A?a ca voi încerca o scurta prezentare a ceea ce este ?i ce face acest consiliul, pentru noi to?i elevii.
